channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Speed bumps totally messed up with holes and infills., 30th March
item.description:
The speed bumps by number 30 Orchard Way, are messed up with holes and infills. Painted markings are also messed up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Orchard Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Smell, 30th March
item.description:
There is a smell on Jersey Avenue that has been present since October. Smells like sewage, so a drain must be blocked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Jersey Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in dangerous brow of hill blind spot causing cars to swere at the top of a bilnd spot hill., 30th March
item.description:
Going north at the brow of the hill just before the entrance road to the old mushroom farm. It is near to the verge side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 very large potholes on Badgerworth Lane near junction for the Readings, 30th March
item.description:
There are 2 very large pot holes that are hard to avoid if traffic is coming in the opposite direction. Would also be hard to see in the dark and are right where the passenger side tyres ago. They are situated after the railway bridge just before the junction for The Readings when driving from Churchdown to Cheltenham.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Old Bath Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Hayden Lane - Pothole repair contractor ran out of tarmac, 29th March
item.description:
A repair was started on a pothole on Hayden Lane, but the contractors appear to have run out of tarmac. There is just a small amount of tarmac on one side in the bottom of it. The pothole is still as wide and deep as it was. What3Words ///files.stay.rounds
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
